constraints.name: path_constraint
constraints.description: 路径上的节点必须满足特定的访问顺序（从 s 到 n 的方向）
constraints.formal: For each s from 0 to (n-1), find the number of reachable nodes in the direction of n

constraints.name: state_transition
constraints.description: 通过某些边后，状态会发生变化（某些通行证失效）
constraints.formal: If a_i < 0, the pass of color |a_i| becomes invalid after passing through the i-th passage

constraints.name: accessibility_constraint
constraints.description: 某些边需要特定的状态才能通过（通行证有效）
constraints.formal: If a_i > 0, the i-th passage can only be passed if the pass of color |a_i| is valid
